body.p: The Board’s decision to issue a practice statement and not an IFRS means that entities applying IFRSs are not required to comply with the Practice Statement, unless specifically required by their jurisdiction. Furthermore, non‑compliance with the Practice Statement does not prevent the entity’s financial statements from complying with IFRSs, if they otherwise do so. Additionally, the entity’s financial statements may comply with IFRSs if an entity has not provided management commentary during a particular financial year.
